segments.text: I heard you were promoted to general manager of IBM's China Headquarters .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's true . I got the news yesterday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You did a good job for the company . You deserve it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So . this is your first day in the new position . How do you feel ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not bad . I'm confident . And I like challenges .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I believe you are cut out for this position . You're an outstanding individual .
segments.speaker: S1
